\xmsection{Hyperlinks and references}\label{sec:hyperlinks}

Notice that we can refer you to all kinds of places: 
% WARNING: links behave differently depending on whether the target is in the PDF or not !!!
% test carefully and thoroughly
\begin{definition}\label{def:def1} $2 \perdef 1+1$
\end{definition}	

\begin{align}
 1 + 1 & = 2 \label{links_test1} \\
 2 + 2 & = 4 \label{links_test2}
\end{align}
